column4: has anyone else had a problem with GAIM not allowing AIM to set a profile, or know how to fix that?
is there a way to change the panel (menu bar thingie)?
is there a way to change the panel (menu bar thingie)?
what are you wanting to change?
it just looks gross, i didn't know of there were ways to put themes or anything on it
you can theme yes
what theme is that?
sudo apt-get install gnome-art
then go to System->preferences->Art Manager
where do i get themes for it from?
it will download them automatically from the gnome art website
oic it
tyvm, didnt know that existed
np
I always have to change the default theme.. I prefer something a bit less bright
yeah, i've messed around with some cool ones, but that toolbar is always gross
run nautilus as root
how do I do that?
make a launcher that does gksudo nautilus
gksudo is the graphical sudo prompt you get when you try to do gui admin stuff
oh.. pops up the thing and dims the screen, tahts all?
yes
ha simple... ty
now when I run gksudo nautilus, i lose all my bookmarks in my file browser, do you know of any way to fix that?
